query: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TABLE_NAME ORDER BY TABLE_NAME SEPARATOR ', ') AS all_tables FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3xenzgJ3NGNThF2.96bc46f6ec2f --database 9n2ukZGVgWAjZMdS2ZS3BU --execute SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TABLE_NAME ORDER BY TABLE_NAME SEPARATOR ', ') AS all_tables FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();
